resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/1200014829</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>1200014829</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>634</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Crossword - The Internet</string>
            <string language="es">Crucigrama - Internet</string>
            <string language="ga">Crosfhocal – an tIdirlíon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreuzworträtsel - Das Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mots croisé - l'Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crossword - O Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parole incrociate - Il Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σταυρόλεξο - το Διαδίκτυο</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">On line interactive crossword that can be used to reinforce and revise the concepts and vocabulary associated with the internet. One can print the crossword, and the solution for use away from the computer.</string>
            <string language="es">Crucigrama interactivo en línea que se puede utilizar para reforzar y revisar los conceptos y vocabulario asociado con Internet. Se puede imprimir el crucigrama y la solución para poder utilizarlos sin el ordenador.</string>
            <string language="ga">Crosfhocal ar líne idirghníomhach ar féidir a úsáid chun coincheapanna agus foclóir a bhaineann leis an idirlíon a láidriú agus dul siar orthu. Is féidir leat an crosfhocal agus an fhreagra a phriontáil agus a úsáid gan ríomhaire.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ICT</string>
            <string language="es">ICT. Páginas web relevantes</string>
            <string language="ga">TCF</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Relevant Websites</string>
            <string language="ga">Láithreáin Ghréasáin Bhainteacha</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auf Zeile interaktives Kreuzworträtsel, die 
benutzt werden kann, um zu verstärken und zu verbessern, verbanden 
die Konzepte und der Wortschatz mit dem Internet. Ein kann das 
Kreuzworträtsel und die Lösung für Gebrauch weg vom Computer 
drucken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sur la ligne mots croisé interactifs qui peut 
être employée pour renforcer et mettre à jour les concepts et le 
vocabulaire se sont associés à l'Internet. On peut imprimer 
les mots croisé, et la solution pour l'usage loin à partir de 
l'ordinateur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Na linha crossword interativo que pode ser usada 
reforçar e revisar os conceitos e o vocabulário associaram com o 
Internet. Um pode imprimir o crossword, e a solução para o uso
away do computador.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In linea parole incrociate interattive che può 
essere usato per rinforzare e modificare i concetti ed il vocabolario 
si sono associati con il Internet. Uno può stampare le parole 
incrociate e la soluzione per uso via dal calcolatore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στο διαλογικό σταυρόλεξο γραμμών που μπορεί να 
χρησιμοποιηθεί για να ενισχύσει και να αναθεωρήσει τις έννοιες και
το λεξιλόγιο που συνδέονται με το Διαδίκτυο. Κάποιος μπορεί
να τυπώσει το σταυρόλεξο, και τη λύση για τη χρήση μακρυά από 
τον υπολογιστή.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Relevante Web site</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sites Web Appropriés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Web site Relevantes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Web site Relativi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχετικοί ιστοχώροι</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>634</entry>
          </identifier>

        <educational>

        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
